name: politico
text:
Donald Trump’s all-out war on mail voting is backfiring in battleground states

https://t.co/WqzAgdLOno

name: politico
text:
Travel is down broadly this summer, the first decline in more than a decade, according to AAA. 

But that data point isn’t slowing the pandemic: Many Americans are still traveling, and the coronavirus has become an unfortunate part of their baggage
https://t.co/PxLPJONN8M

name: politico
text:
Keep up with the politics, policies, and technologies driving long-term changes to our health. Subscribe to our Future Pulse newsletter to explore the collision of health care and technology.
https://t.co/g1TBSURK83 https://t.co/JxCp3r91qY

name: politico
text:
Three quarters of white evangelicals supported Trump in 2016 and their support for him remains high. But his approval among this group has dipped.

It’s not clear that this will translate into more votes for Dems but there are at least some signs of change
https://t.co/BnosZ0PtqS

name: politico
text:
A Justice Department and FBI review of their practices for seeking approval of intelligence-related surveillance found that nearly all of the inaccuracies and omissions identified in a scathing internal watchdog report issued last year were minor

https://t.co/nR4VI4LRhU

name: politico
text:
Amid a renewed push by Trump to remove those in the country without documentation from the count, Census Bureau Director Steven Dillingham now says the data will be sent to the president by the end of the year 
https://t.co/Y4gbWUrdbl

name: politico
text:
A little-known American company has secured a contract to develop and export the region’s crude oil under a secretive deal approved by the U.S. government.

It comes months after President Trump announced he was leaving U.S. troops to “secure the oil”
https://t.co/6QDJmBL07p

name: politico
text: Trump’s untamed political instincts, once treated by so many fellow Republicans with an almost mystical revery, appear increasingly unlikely to stave off defeat in November https://t.co/BlCBPD4coO
